trans-unit.source: Enables managed code to handle exceptions that indicate a corrupted process state.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 Managed 程式碼，以處理表示處理序損毀狀態的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Corrupted process state exceptions are exceptions that indicate that the state of a process has been corrupted.
trans-unit.target: 處理序損毀的狀態例外狀況是，以指出程序的狀態已損毀的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: We do not recommend executing your application in this state.
trans-unit.target: 我們不建議在此狀態中執行您的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: By default, the common language runtime (CLR) does not deliver these exceptions to managed code, and the `try`/`catch` blocks (and other exception-handling clauses) are not invoked for them.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，common language runtime (CLR) 便不會傳遞這些例外狀況 managed 程式碼，而`try` / `catch`區塊 （和其他例外狀況處理子句） 不會叫用它們。

trans-unit.source: If you are absolutely sure that you want to maintain your handling of these exceptions, you must apply the <xref:System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.HandleProcessCorruptedStateExceptionsAttribute> attribute to the method whose exception-handling clauses you want to execute.
trans-unit.target: 如果您完全確定您想要維護這些例外狀況的處理時，您必須套用<xref:System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.HandleProcessCorruptedStateExceptionsAttribute>方法您想要執行的例外狀況處理子句。

trans-unit.source: The CLR delivers the corrupted process state exception to applicable exception clauses only in methods that have both the <xref:System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.HandleProcessCorruptedStateExceptionsAttribute> and <xref:System.Security.SecurityCriticalAttribute> attributes.
trans-unit.target: CLR 會損毀處理序狀態例外狀況傳遞至方法中，同時有適用的例外狀況子句<xref:System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.HandleProcessCorruptedStateExceptionsAttribute>和<xref:System.Security.SecurityCriticalAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also add the to your application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以加入至您的應用程式組態檔。

trans-unit.source: This will ensure that corrupted state exceptions are delivered to your exception handlers without the <xref:System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.HandleProcessCorruptedStateExceptionsAttribute> or <xref:System.Security.SecurityCriticalAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 這可確保損毀的狀態例外狀況會傳遞到您的例外狀況處理常式，而不<xref:System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.HandleProcessCorruptedStateExceptionsAttribute>或<xref:System.Security.SecurityCriticalAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This configuration element has no effect on applications that were compiled in versions previous to the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] but are running in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or later; corrupted state exceptions will continue to be delivered for those applications.
trans-unit.target: 這個組態項目已在之前的版本所編譯的應用程式不會影響[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]中執行，但[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]或更新版本損毀的狀態例外狀況將會繼續傳遞那些應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.HandleProcessCorruptedStateExceptionsAttribute> attribute is ignored when it is encountered in partially trusted or transparent code, because a trusted host should not allow an untrusted add-in to catch and ignore these serious exceptions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.HandleProcessCorruptedStateExceptionsAttribute>屬性時，會忽略發生在部分信任或安全性透明程式碼，因為不受信任增益集來攔截並略過這些嚴重的例外狀況，應該不允許受信任的主機。

trans-unit.source: For more information about corrupted process state exceptions, see the entry [Handling Corrupted State Exceptions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=179681) in the CLR Inside Out blog.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關處理序損毀的狀態例外狀況的詳細資訊，請參閱文章[處理已損毀狀態例外狀況](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=179681)CLR Inside Out 的部落格。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.HandleProcessCorruptedStateExceptionsAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.HandleProcessCorruptedStateExceptionsAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。
